sentence.Network_en: Sunday is the most important day in a week for the Congolese.
sentence.Network_cn: 星期日是刚果国民一个星期最重要的日子.

sentence.Network_en: Much will depend on the maturity of the Congolese army.
sentence.Network_cn: 战斗的最终胜利在很大程度上依赖的是刚果政府军的完备.

sentence.Network_en: Congolese lawyers toil as waiters and chefs.
sentence.Network_cn: 刚果律师在服务员和厨师的职位上劳碌着.
